trans-unit.source: Represents a reference to an event.
trans-unit.target: Representa uma referência a um evento.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeEventReferenceExpression> can be used to represent a reference to an event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeEventReferenceExpression> pode ser usado para representar uma referência a um evento.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeEventReferenceExpression.TargetObject%2A> property specifies the object that contains the event.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeEventReferenceExpression.TargetObject%2A> propriedade especifica o objeto que contém o evento.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeEventReferenceExpression.EventName%2A> property specifies the name of the event.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeEventReferenceExpression.EventName%2A> propriedade especifica o nome do evento.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates use of <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeEventReferenceExpression> to reference an event named TestEvent.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir demonstra o uso de <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeEventReferenceExpression> para fazer referência a um evento chamado TestEvent.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeEventReferenceExpression" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeEventReferenceExpression" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeEventReferenceExpression" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeEventReferenceExpression" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeExpression" /> that indicates the object that contains the event.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeExpression" /> que indica o objeto que contém o evento.

trans-unit.source: The name of the event to reference.
trans-unit.target: O nome do evento a referenciar.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeEventReferenceExpression" /> class using the specified target object and event name.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeEventReferenceExpression" /> usando o nome do evento e o objeto de destino especificados.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the event.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o nome do evento.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the object that contains the event.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o objeto que contém o evento.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeExpression" /> that indicates the object that contains the event.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeExpression" /> que indica o objeto que contém o evento.
